Posts.Content: After having my surgery 8 days ago visited Urologist who performed my surgery he told me I had microscopic in bladder neck. He wants me to keep cath in for 2 weeks and then heal complete before doing my next PSA test. He wants me to wait 90 days before testing my PSA does anyone know why?Everyone we talk to wonders why wait so long before having 1st PSA test after surgery. He did indicate we want a non-detectable result or radiation will be our next approach.
Posts.Title: Robotic assisted radical prostectomy
